Description: Terracotta mould-made lamp. Applied vertical band-handle. Discus depicts a leaf. Shoulder decorated with fish, spectacle pattern, etc; below is a row of raised points. Pointed oval base-ring, with large point at tip. Pink clay with mica covered with a red slip.
Curator's comments: Close: Säve-Söderbergh, T., 1981. ‘Late Nubian cemeteries’. New York : Scandinavian University Books, pl. 15, 4, from Serra, near Faras. Bibl. 'Liverpool AAA' xiv, 1927, p. 73.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (2233)
